data.name: AssociateLegalAction
data.value: update CKT_DISB_SUPPR_STS set LGA_IDENTIFIER = @lgaIdentifier where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (DSS_GENERATED_ID = @dssGeneratedId)

data.name: CreateCsePersonAccount
CreateDisbSuppressionStatusHistory
ReadCollectionType
data.value: select top(1) COLLECTION_TYPE_ID, CODE, NAME from CKT_COLLTN_TYPE where CODE = @code

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (TYPE = @type) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)

data.name: ReadDisbSuppressionStatusHistory
data.value: select CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, DSS_GENERATED_ID, CLT_SEQUENTIAL_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, TYPE, REASON_TEXT, LGA_IDENTIFIER from CKT_DISB_SUPPR_STS where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (TYPE in ('C', 'O')) and ( ( (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate) ) or (EFFECTIVE_DATE between cast(@discontinueDate as date) and cast(@effectiveDate as date)) ) and (@cltSequentialId = CLT_SEQUENTIAL_ID)

data.name: ReadLegalAction1
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where STANDARD_NO = @standardNo

data.name: ReadLegalAction2
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId
